name: loop54-js-demo
description: Frontend demo of Loop54 functionallity useing JS-lib. Using jQuery.

scripts.dev: npm run watch:demo & npm run server
scripts.babelify:demo: browserify src/index.js -o bin/Scripts/loop54-demo-1.0.0.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-2 ] ]
